template.name: BlazeMeter Citrix Recording
template.description:
Template you can use to record a Citrix application called through ICA Client

This template is provided by Citrix Plugin which allows load testing Citrix Applications.
Ensure you read Pre-requisites and User Manual before using the plugin. See Useful links below. Once the new plan is created update configuration properties on the Citrix Recorder element.
